<p><object data="http://www.twitch.tv/swflibs/TwitchPlayer.swf" height="378" id="clip_embed_player_flash" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="420"><param name="movie" value="http://www.twitch.tv/swflibs/TwitchPlayer.swf"><param name="allowScriptAccess" value="always"><param name="allowNetworking" value="all"><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"><param name="flashvars" value="channel=cybutek&auto_play=false&start_volume=25&videoId=a590540381"></object><br/><a href="http://bit.ly/1yqEfcd"><strong>CYBUTEK</strong></a> has recently taken. developing a KSP plugin live on Twitch. If you’re not into development and want to get a look at some of the highlights and lowlights of one person’s experience through it, give this past broadcast a view.</p>
